home.name: Vladyslav Kravchenko
home.text: 20 years old, Kyiv. Front-end developer with a year of commercial experience. Total experience in IT for 3 years.

portfolio.title0: Todo application, works with backend mockAPI

portfolio.title3: A multi-page informative online casino site

portfolio.title5: Multi-page site with landing on WordPress
portfolio.title7: Multi-page site for ordering auto peripherals

skills.skills9: Professional adaptive layout of the website interface of rather high complexity
skills.list1: When programming a web application in React, I use this architecture as a basis:
skills.list2: - UI layer - scss or modular style connection, context via react-redux connect-om library or hooks, compose, custom hooks, HOCs, etc.
skills.list3: - BLL (Business Logic Layer) - Redux / Redux Toolkit, RTK Query, thunkMiddleware, etc
skills.list5: Adhering to presentational and container components
skills.plugins1: Main plugins/libraries that I actively use:
skills.plugins14: - for browser React DevTools + Redux DevTools
skills.additional1: Familiar with many other less used plugins, the list can be very long but it's not so important, in general it's not a problem for me to read the documentation and start using some new addon.
skills.additional2: With standard HTML layout, I assemble the project on a personal Gulp assembly, judging by the task, I include jQuery. I write styles on the scss preprocessor proactively.
skills.additional3: Deeply familiar with project optimization tasks.
